nodes.bodyText: Just asking, why exclude these modules?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -301,14 +301,22 @@ dependencies {
     compile 'software.amazon.randomcutforest:randomcutforest-serialization-json:1.0-alpha'
 
     compile "org.jacoco:org.jacoco.agent:0.8.5"
-    compile "org.jacoco:org.jacoco.ant:0.8.5"
-    compile "org.jacoco:org.jacoco.core:0.8.5"
-    compile "org.jacoco:org.jacoco.report:0.8.5"
+    compile ("org.jacoco:org.jacoco.ant:0.8.5") {
+        exclude group: 'org.ow2.asm', module: 'asm-commons'

nodes.bodyText: In ES 7.9, they added those dependencies ( https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/blob/master/modules/lang-painless/build.gradle#L36 ). We are also including this dependency through transitive from code-coverage . This caused jar Hell error ( es checks whether any multiple jars of same or different version is being included ). Hence, i excluded this jar to be added into our plugin while downloading org.jacoco:org.jacoco.ant for code coverage.
